rounds.comments: (Alex: Words that are made up.  For example, if I said "A ten-dollar bill plus a pail", "What is a sawbucket?")

clues.text: A pointed fastener used on bulletin boards plus an apex

rounds.text: This city that Napoleon gave to Bavaria in 1806 has hosted the Winter Olympics twice
